column5: Come and enjoy a vacation or stay for a long time in this beautifully furnished Padre Island studio condo. Cool off in the sparkling community pool. Fish off the dock on a deep-water canal. Short distance to the beach for swimming, surfing, kite flying, walking and splashing in the waves, people-watching. Packery Channel fishing jetties nearby. And then there's Schlitterbahn Water Park, National Seashore, variety of excellent restaurants. Sorry, no pets. Minimum stay--5 nights.
column8: Padre Island Studio Condo near Beach
